summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing transportation charges for various shipments associated with Jeffrey Epstein and his company. It includes multiple entries for packages sent and received, along with the associated costs and details of the senders and recipients.

keyFacts: The invoice details multiple shipments sent by Jeffrey Epstein and his associates using FedEx.
Various individuals are listed as senders and recipients of packages, indicating a network of business relationships.
The total charges for the services rendered amount to $339.13.
The document includes specific dates of package pickups and deliveries, primarily in July 1999.
Several packages were sent from Epstein's company to various locations, including properties in New Albany, OH.
